plot(<Taxa>) print(<Taxa>) `[`(<Taxa>)

Taxa training and testing objects

Constructing COGs

Functions to construct COGs from annotated genetic regions

DisjointSet()

Return single linkage clusters from PairSummaries objects.

ExtractBy()

Extract and organize DNAStringSetss.

FindSets()

Find all single linkage clusters in an undirected pairs list.

print(<LinkedPairs>)

Tables of where syntenic hits link pairs of genes

NucleotideOverlap()

Tabulating Pairs of Genomic Sequences

PairSummaries()

Summarize connected pairs in a LinkedPairs object

BlockExpansion()

Attempt to expand blocks of paired features in a PairSummaries object.

Functions for phylogenetic reconstruction of genomes or COGs

Compute cophenetic distances on dendrogram objects

DistanceMatrix()

Calculate the Distances Between Sequences

IdClusters()

Cluster Sequences By Similarity

TreeLine()

Construct a Phylogenetic Tree

WriteDendrogram()

Functions for finding co-evolutionary signal between COGs

ProtWeaver: Predicting Protein Functional Association Networks

predict(<ProtWeaver>)

Make predictions with ProtWeaver objects

plot(<ProtWeb>)
